name: Just Dance 2024 Edition
summary: Dance and share exciting moments all year long with the #1 music video game platform of all time! Just Dance 2024 Edition features 40 new tracks and universes from all genres and eras, including “Flowers” by Miley Cyrus, “Tití Me Preguntó” by Bad Bunny, “How You Like That” by BLACKPINK and "I Wanna Dance With Somebody" by Whitney Houston!
